documents.document: Thank you @sseairtricity for finally getting a human (and a very professional one at that) to call me https://t.co/L2VeNRr5YP
.@sseairtricity I'd be surprised if you had too many customers called Lisa Pereira
.@sseairtricity Thanks for your concern, Gary, but I really don't think there's anything to check out. You can look me up if you want (1/2)
.@sseairtricity Was it you who rang me with an anonymous recorded message? You really need to rethink that policy. Get a human to do it.
@richardluddite yes I think so ðŸ˜¡
@NiallStanage I notice @sseairtricity do like their anonymous recorded messages. Have experienced it before. Very bad customer service
@NiallStanage I googled it and some suggested it's @sseairtricity looking for payment. I am with airtricity but paid bill last week (1/2)
Just got call from (01)4806410 with recorded voice looking for Lisa Pereira. If it was me, I should press 1. No identification. What's that?
